span.span: Represents the radiuses of a rectangle's corners.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类具有四个属性：、、 和 ，它们对应于矩形的各个角。This class has four properties, , , , and , corresponding to the individual corners of the rectangle. 每个 结构都可以独立于其他结构进行设置。Each is a structure that can be set independently of the others. Radiuses 不能为负。The radiuses cannot be negative. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```xaml ``` - 或 --or- ```xaml ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *TopLeft**TopLeft* 值，该值指定左上角的半径。 value that specifies the radius of the top left corner. *右上**TopRight* 指定右上角的值。 value that specifies the top right corner. *BottomRight**BottomRight* 指定右下角的值。 value that specifies the bottom right corner. *BottomLeft**BottomLeft* 指定左下角的值。 value that specifies the bottom left corner. *AllCorners**AllCorners* 如果只指定了一个 值，则该度量值将应用于的所有 *TopLeft*、 *右上*、 *BottomRight*和 *BottomLeft* 角 。If only a single value is specified, that measure is applied to ALL of the *TopLeft*, *TopRight*, *BottomRight*, and *BottomLeft* corners of the . > [!NOTE] > 指定为字符串时，值不需要显式包含小数点。Values need not include the decimal point explicitly when specified as a string. 当在代码中引用时，在中提供的字符串 "1" 的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 计算结果为1.0 的值。The string "1" provided in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] evaluates to a value of 1.0 when referenced in code. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 使用和代码设置属性的值 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 。The following example shows how to set the value of the property by using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] and code. [!code-csharp[ThicknessStruct#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ThicknessStruct/CSharp/ThicknessSamp.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ThicknessStruct#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ThicknessStruct/VisualBasic/ThicknessSampVB.vb#1)] [!code-xaml[ThicknessStruct#1](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ThicknessStruct/XAML/default.xaml#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置左下角的半径。

span.span: Gets or sets the radius of the bottom-left corner.
The radius of the bottom-left corner.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 左下角的半径可以独立于矩形的其他角进行设置。The radius of the bottom-left corner can be set independently of the other corners of the rectangle.
